ygData.subject: Re: Please, Don't Die!

From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>


* Iron Raptor sighed and sniffed as she held Prowl to her, her finger tips 
stroking his fluid covered cheek.
She didn't notice as Prowl came to, simply holding him and dwelling on the 
feeling of his dying body against her.
With her mind dwelling on the only thing in her life that mattered, Prowl, 
she didn't notice Firearm speak and leave the room.
It was all so strange, and everything seemed almost as it it were in a 
dream. But it was all happening, it was all for real.
Iron Raptor nearly jumps out of her armor when she feels something touch her 
cheek, opening her optics in time to see Prowls fingers touch her cheek.
She takes his hand and holds it as it relaxes and finally goes limp, looking 
over to look into his optics with hope that he was feeling a little better 
now, and would live.
But with his energy so low, she knew that that was hoping for a bit too 
much.
Iron Raptor held Prowl closer to her, her optics looking sadly into his.
She watched as her love tried to speak, and heard his fading voice.
More tears ran from her eyes as she sat there with him, very well being 
their last moments together.
Her voice was a whisper, but held more love then ever possable.*

" I...love you too."


* She could feel Prowl slipping farther and farther away from her now, 
almost as if all he wanted was to tell her he loved her, and was ready to 
die now.
Iron Raptor watched as Prowl leaned his head back and looked up at her, 
their eyes meeting and her seeing his filled with love.
She stroked her fingers gently along his cheek and neck, realizing that this 
was probably it. The last moment they would ever be together.
With her spark aching and her eyes wet she leaned close to him.*

" You're in my spark, Prowl...forever."

* And with that she kissed him gently on the lips, then deepening it with 
expressions of her love for him.
For, this would be their last.*
